question: If you submit a price of 70 and the market clearing price is 60 you will:
You hold 2 shares. Your weight w_i is 0.7. 100 is the benefit amount from the policy and C is the cost of the policy. What is your net benefit if the policy is approved:
If you sell an asset then
choice1: Your cash holdings will decrease by the market price
choice2: Your cash holdings will increase by the market price
choice3: Your cash holdings will increase by your submitted price
solution: Your cash holdings will increase by the market price

question: If a majority vote to approve the proposal then what is the net payoff for those who hold one share:
If a majority vote to reject the proposal then what is the share payout for those that hold two shares
The personal benefit from the policy is
choice1: the same for all market participants
choice3: zero for those who do not hold any shares
